
Library haee ke az ebtedaaie barnaame va dar teie module initialize (loadModules)
mikhaahim dar dastras baashand injaa gharaar migirand.
	maanande : strings emulators, Ecrypter, apache mod_rewrite detector, ... 
	ke mitavaanad dar chegoonegi e ejraaie barnaame dekhaalat daashte baashad. 

pishnaahad mishavad ke,
	library haaee maanande: image transform(thumbnailer), Htmlpurifier, Smarty, ...
	tavasote module haa be system mo'arefi shavad.
	
(by developer)
